A

action(Board) - Method in class Cherrybomb
Triggers the Cherrybomb's explosion, dealing damage to all zombies within a 3x3 radius centered on the Cherrybomb's tile.
action(Board) - Method in class Peashooter
Executes the Peashooter's attack action: creates and places a projectile.
action(Board) - Method in class Plant
Defines the primary action of the plant.
action(Board) - Method in class Sunflower
Executes the Sunflower's action: producing a Sun collectible.
action(Board) - Method in class Wallnut
Defines the Wall-nut's primary action.
addMouseListeners() - Method in class Controller
Adds mouse listeners to the plant selection buttons and the game board.
addSun(Sun) - Method in class Tile
Adds a sun collectible to this tile's list of suns.
addTime(double) - Static method in class GameClock
Adds a specified duration to the total elapsed game time.
AnimationManager - Class in Unnamed Package
Manages loading and accessing animation and image assets for the game.
AnimationManager() - Constructor for class AnimationManager
Constructs an AnimationManager with empty sprite and image maps.
Armor - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a piece of armor that can be equipped by an entity (e.g., zombies).
Armor(int, double, String) - Constructor for class Armor
Constructs a new Armor instance with specified health, speed bonus, and name.
ArmorManager - Class in Unnamed Package
Manages the creation and cycling of Armor objects based on a level file.
ArmorManager() - Constructor for class ArmorManager
Initializes the armor manager with predefined armor mappings.
attack(Plant) - Method in class Zombie
Makes the zombie attack a given plant, inflicting damage.

B

Board - Class in Unnamed Package
Handles the state and behavior of the game board including tile management, entity updates, spawning of zombies and suns, and wave logic.
Board(int, int) - Constructor for class Board
Constructs the board with the specified number of lanes and tiles.
BoardPanel - Class in Unnamed Package
Renders the game board and all active entities.
BoardPanel(AnimationManager, int, int, int) - Constructor for class BoardPanel
Constructs the board panel with dimensions and animation data.

C

Cherrybomb - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a Cherrybomb plant, an explosive plant that deals area-of-effect damage.
Cherrybomb(int, int) - Constructor for class Cherrybomb
Constructs a new Cherrybomb instance at the specified lane and tile.
collectSun(ArrayList<Sun>) - Method in class Player
Collects sun from a list of Sun objects, adding their value to the total sun count.
Cone - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a Cone armor type, extending the abstract Armor class.
Cone() - Constructor for class Cone
Constructs a new Cone armor instance.
Controller - Class in Unnamed Package
Manages user interactions, game flow, and updates between the GUI and the game board.
Controller(Gui, Board) - Constructor for class Controller
Constructs a new Controller instance, linking it to the GUI and game board.

Constructs an entity with a specified vertical offset (e.g., floating projectile).

Equips armor to the zombie, modifying its type and speed based on the armor's properties.
explode(Tile) - Method in class Cherrybomb
Applies explosion damage to all zombies on a given tile.
